verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> when he <S%H1961>was<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art my <S%H410>God;<s%> early will I <S%H7836>seek<s%> thee: my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6770>thirsteth<s%> for thee, my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H3642>longeth<s%> for thee in a <S%H6723>dry<s%> and <S%H5889>thirsty<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> where <S%H1097>no<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> is;
To <S%H7200>see<s%> thy <S%H5797>power<s%> and thy <S%H3519>glory,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> as I have <S%H2372>seen<s%> thee in the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H4480>life,<s%> <S%H2416><s%> my <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall <S%H7623>praise<s%> thee.
Thus <S%H3651><s%> will I <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee while I <S%H2416>live:<s%> I will lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> in thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>

My <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> <S%H3644>as<s%> with <S%H2459>marrow<s%> and <S%H1880>fatness;<s%> and my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall <S%H1984>praise<s%> thee with <S%H7445>joyful<s%> lips: <S%H8193><s%>
When <S%H518><s%> I <S%H2142>remember<s%> thee <S%H5921>upon<s%> my <S%H3326>bed,<s%> and <S%H1897>meditate<s%> on thee in the night <S%H821>watches.<s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> thou hast <S%H1961>been<s%> my <S%H5833>help,<s%> therefore in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of thy <S%H3671>wings<s%> will I <S%H7442>rejoice.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> followeth <S%H1692>hard<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> thee: thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> <S%H8551>upholdeth<s%> me.
But <S%H1992>those<s%> that <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> to <S%H7722>destroy<s%> it, shall <S%H935>go<s%> into the lower <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
They shall <S%H5064>fall<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> <S%H3027><s%> the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H4521>portion<s%> for <S%H7776>foxes.<s%>

But the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in <S%H430>God;<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> that <S%H7650>sweareth<s%> by him shall <S%H1984>glory:<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of them that <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%> shall be <S%H5534>stopped.<s%>
